roleset.name: to place side by side, side by side placement

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Either way it was a pity , because Mr. Stolzman offered the most substantial music of the evening [*ICH*-1] just after intermission : Steve Reich 's `` New York Counterpoint , '' one of a series of Reich works that [*T*1]juxtapose a live performer with recorded tracks of his or her own playing .
example.arg: with recorded tracks of his or her own playing

roleset.note: JUXTAPOSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'juxtapose' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from juxtapose.01-v predicate notes)
JUXTAPOSITION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from juxtaposition.01-n)
